titles.title: Equal Justice for United States Military Personnel Act of 2007
Equal Justice for United States Military Personnel Act of 2007
A bill to allow for certiorari review of certain cases denied relief or review by the United States Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 959.

bill.summary: 9/12/2008--Reported to Senate without amendment. Equal Justice for United States Military Personnel Act of 2007 - Amends the federal judicial code to allow for review by writ of certiorari of certain cases denied relief or review by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Armed Forces.
